comments.author: Aison
comments.content: In China, the government is working hard to get people to do virus testing and treatment，Virus testing, treatment, care, beds, food and ambulances are all free，The patient pays zero for it，Even more incredible, after the Chinese shiyan city people fever，If they take the initiative to do a virus test，Not only do they not have to pay, the government also rewards them with 1,000 ¥，In Qianjiang, China, people will get a reward of 10,000 ¥ if they report a fever case to the government.....Very proactive！But in contrast...Many countries are not actively testing for the virus，It is difficult for patients to apply for testing qualification，Testing costs are also very expensive....In this situation, it is inevitable that a large number of people will not be detected.There are many signs that they are doing it on purpose.There will be no confirmed cases without testing，The epidemic is not serious without a confirmed case，Governments do n’t have to block cities to isolate viruses，So the economy and stocks will not collapse，Capitalists will be very happy..Even if people get a new virus and die, they are considered to have died from the flu..Capital is the boss in the capitalist countries.The interest of capital always prevails，The life and health of ordinary people is not important.

When this virus brings the rest of the world to it's knees, they will see and be impressed with what it means to overcome this challenge.
